description: Advances from a bustling town to a veritable metropolis, full of the wonders of modern technology. This is the Kush city phase, where workers gatehr grain 10% faster. While archers gain 3 range but take 10% more train time.
tooltip: Advance to Town Phase, which unlocks more entities and technologies. Civic Centers +25% territory influence radius and 25% more garrison capacity. Structures +10% damage and +7 capture points regeneration rate per garrisoned unit. All Citizens 10% more health. Workers 10% faster farming. Archers take 10% less time to train
